item.title: Ramaswamy Leaves DOGE to Run for Ohio Governor

item.title: Trump Takes Oath of Office
item.description: Donald Trump was sworn in as the 47th president of the United States on Monday, four years after his first term ended.

item.title: Biden Pardons His Siblings and Their Spouses
item.description: Moments before his presidency ended Monday, Joe Biden issued preemptive pardons for his family members.

item.title: FBI Deputy Director Abbate Says He's Leaving Bureau
